title: Kaley Cuoco’s husband gets along with Johnny Galecki
content:
Kaley Cuoco says that her husband Ryan Sweeting and her ex-boyfriend Johnny Galecki are actually good friends. 
 
In an appearance on “Watch What Happens Live”, the “Big Bang Theory” actress revealed that they get along smashingly.  Who knew? 
 
She revealed, “Well, we dated like five years ago, so I think we both moved on.  Johnny is actually one of my best friends.  It’s a situation that ended well.  I understand sometimes it doesn’t.  It could have gone horrible.” 
 
She went on to say, “He’s one of my dearest friends.  Ryan loves him.  Johnny loves him.  It’s been a long time, so it’s great.  I got lucky!  That could have been horrible.” 
 
Kaley and Johnny met on the set of the hit CBS show and dated from 2007 to 2010.  During that time, they kept the details of their romantic lives a secret until she finally talked about it after their breakup.
